data.name: S&M: FL
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to join the official QQ group: 224145331, where you can discuss the game with many players and give feedback about the game in the group.

Players need to roll dice on the board to advance, and to reach certain points they need to fight. Imagine running into an enemy stronghold all by yourself, trying to kill them all in one second. It doesn't exist! The first thing you do is defend, and then you find the time to attack. Of course, you can also attack first, but there is a risk involved.

Planning your resources and figuring out the optimal way to roll dice and fight is the key to your success!
data.about_the_game:
Welcome to join the official QQ group: 224145331, where you can discuss the game with many players and give feedback about the game in the group.

Players need to roll dice on the board to advance, and to reach certain points they need to fight. Imagine running into an enemy stronghold all by yourself, trying to kill them all in one second. data.short_description: This is a board + action type of game. Test the player's reflexes, luck, strategy. Who doesn't love to roll the dice on a chessboard? Facing many enemies alone, even failure does not mean final defeat, and can even become a layout leading to victory! That's the beauty of the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 (亦可同等级 AMD 或 NVIDIA 显卡)
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
